messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Names of Homeschools
messages.msgSnippet: I live in California and we named our school Living Lighthouse Rachel ... From: KathrynJB@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday,
messages.messageBody:
I live in California and we named our school "Living Lighthouse"
Rachel
----- Original Message -----
From: KathrynJB@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, September 07, 2001 12:15 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Names of Homeschools


In a message dated 09/07/2001 3:03:57 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> And in California, we have to file an R-4 private school affadavit to
> homeschool/unshool legally and we got to name our "school". Our is
> Milliways (The restauarant at the end of the universe).
>
>

We DON'T have to, but early on we named ours Collins Cove Clothing Optional
Homeschool. We lived across the street from a beach called Collins Cove,
and, well, the rest... Let's just say that we're selective about who we offer
the full name to.

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
